results.content:
Loved it.
Everything was explained really well.

At first I was a bit afraid the Symofyny 5.3 annotations would be skimmed over or not even mentioned but everything was taken into account.

first course I've taken that I really learned all the basics and more from to get me started with symfony.

Great course and definitely worth the money!

Hello and thank you. I found it nice, a bit difficult from time to time because the usage of german therms for variables, routes, etc. 
Thank you and good luck

results.content: It's a great course if you want to master Symfony, I really recommend it

results.content:
I learned a lot from this course. A recommendation to anyone who wants to learn the basics.
The only thing that really bothered me was that the code was written in German ... It's very confusing.
